mapper.sql: SELECT t1.id, t1.project_id, t2.project_name as projectName, t1.`name`, t1.proportion, t3.nickname as create_user_str, t4.nickname as update_user_str, t1.create_time, t1.update_time FROM ted_knowledge_type as t1 LEFT JOIN ted_project as t2 ON t1.project_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN sys_user as t3 ON t1.create_user = t3.id LEFT JOIN sys_user as t4 ON t1.update_user = t4.id
